text: Vasaloppet de la Sergerie is a cross-country skiing event held around Le Norvégien in the Quebec province in Canada. The event was first held in 2007. Held in February or early March, the event is named after Vasaloppet in Sweden. == References == Category:2007 establishments in Quebec Category:February sporting events Category:March sporting events Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2007 Category:Skiing in Quebec Category:Ski marathons Category:Sports competitions in Quebec
title: Vasaloppet de la Sergerie
